title: T206 ++ L@@K for ++ some tougher combos

posts.post_title: T206 ++ L@@K for ++ some tougher combos
posts.post_content:
Like to “back upgrade” some Sov.s.   

None of these combos are easy, to say the least … :o ... But if you don't ask, you don't know ….......... ;)

Frank Chance (Portrait Yellow) --AB, Cycle, EPDG
Joe Doyle (NY Hands Above Head) – EPDG, OM, Tolstoi
Clark Griffith (Batting) – Cycle
Orval Overall (Hand Face Level) – AB 460, Tolstoi
Barney Pelty (Vertical Photo) – AB, Cycle, EPDG
Ed Reulbach (No Glove Showing) –  Cycle :eek:
Gabby Street (Catching) --Cycle, EPDG

Peaches Graham (Boston) – EPDG
Rebel Oakes– Tolstoi :p
Ira Thomas – Cycle

Hal Chase (Holding Trophy) – AB, Cycle
Arlie Latham – AB, Cycle
Harry Howell (Hand At Waist) – AB, Cycle, EPDG

Also always looking for Hindus .......... :)

Thanks, Scott
